<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>8</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>15</mn>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>32</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>6</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>5</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{*{20}{rcl}}   {8x - 15y}&{ = }&{ - 32} \\    {6x + 3y}&{ = }&{ - 5}  \end{array}\right.</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: Decide whether it would be more convenient to solve the system of equations by substitution or elimination.
